languages.text: "И не остановил их. Фиксирую нарушение заповеди "будь стражем верным горна своего". Отступник Дзета-86, твои доступы отозваны. Продолжай доклад". {n}Ледяной рокот, идущий из вокса Паскаля, заставляет техножреца испуганно и покаянно склонить голову.{/n}

"And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И не остановил их. Фиксирую нарушение заповеди "будь стражем верным горна своего". Отступник Дзета-86, твои доступы отозваны. Продолжай доклад". {n}Ледяной рокот, идущий из вокса Паскаля, заставляет техножреца испуганно и покаянно склонить голову.{/n}

Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “而你却没有做任何事情来阻止他们。我正在记录你的违规行为，你违背了这条戒律——要以身守护锻造厂。我在此再次撤销你的权限，叛教者泽塔86号。继续报告吧。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置传来了冰冷的轰隆声，思律机僧在恐惧与悔悟中低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而你却没有做任何事情来阻止他们。我正在记录你的违规行为，你违背了这条戒律——要以身守护锻造厂。我在此再次撤销你的权限，叛教者泽塔86号。继续报告吧。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置传来了冰冷的轰隆声，法律技工在恐惧与悔悟中低下了头。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Y no hiciste nada para impedirlo. Estoy registrando una violación del mandamiento "De tu propia forja sé el mayor centinela". Apóstata Zeta-86, tus accesos quedan revocados de inmediato. Continúa con el informe». {n}El sonido helado y retumbante del vox de Pasqal hace que el lexmecánico agache la cabeza, asustado y arrepentido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y no hiciste nada para impedirlo. Estoy registrando una violación del mandamiento "De tu propia forja sé el mayor centinela". Apóstata Zeta-86, tus accesos quedan revocados de inmediato. Continúa con el informe». {n}El sonido helado y retumbante del vox de Pasqal hace que el lexmecánico agache la cabeza, asustado y arrepentido.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、彼らを止めるために何もしなかった。『汝、己が鍛冶場の真のセンチネルであれ』という戒律への違反を記録する。背教者Zeta-86、そのアクセスはここに取り消されます。報告を続けてください」{n}パスカルのヴォクスから聞こえる氷のような音に、法技術者は恐怖と悔恨のあまり頭を下げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして、彼らを止めるために何もしなかった。『汝、己が鍛冶場の真のセンチネルであれ』という戒律への違反を記録する。背教者Zeta-86、そのアクセスはここに取り消されます。報告を続けてください」{n}パスカルのヴォクスから聞こえる氷のような音に、法技術者は恐怖と悔恨のあまり頭を下げた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Und habt nichts getan, um sie aufzuhalten. Ich vermerke einen Verstoß gegen das Gebot 'Du sollst ein wahrer Wächter deiner eigenen Schmiede sein'. Apostat Zeta-86, sämtliche Zugriffe sind Euch hiermit aberkannt. Setzt Euren Bericht fort." {n}Das eisige Grollen aus Pasqals Vox lässt den Lexmechanicus den Kopf senken, erfüllt von Angst und Bußfertigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und habt nichts getan, um sie aufzuhalten. Ich vermerke einen Verstoß gegen das Gebot 'Du sollst ein wahrer Wächter deiner eigenen Schmiede sein'. Apostat Zeta-86, sämtliche Zugriffe sind Euch hiermit aberkannt. Setzt Euren Bericht fort." {n}Das eisige Grollen aus Pasqals Vox lässt den Lexmechanicus den Kopf senken, erfüllt von Angst und Bußfertigkeit.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Et vous n'avez rien fait pour les arrêter. J'enregistre cette violation du commandement "De ta propre forge soit la sentinelle inébranlable". Apostat Zêta-86, vos accès sont dès à présent révoqués. Continuez votre rapport. » {n}Le lexmécanicien baisse la tête, pris de peur et de contrition en entendant la voix glaciale de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et vous n'avez rien fait pour les arrêter. J'enregistre cette violation du commandement "De ta propre forge soit la sentinelle inébranlable". Apostat Zêta-86, vos accès sont dès à présent révoqués. Continuez votre rapport. » {n}Le lexmécanicien baisse la tête, pris de peur et de contrition en entendant la voix glaciale de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Onları durduracak bir şey de yapmamışsın. 'Kendi iradenle nöbetçi ol.' buyruğunu ihlal ettiğini kayıtlara geçiyorum. Apotr Zeta-86, erişimlerini an itibarıyla kaldırıyorum. Raporunu bildirebilirsin." {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan gelen soğuk gürültü, Lexmekanik'in korku ve nedamet içinde başını eğmesine yol açıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And did nothing to stop them. I am recording a violation of the commandment 'Of thine own forge be a true sentinel.' Apostate Zeta-86, your accesses are hereby revoked. Proceed with your report." {n}The icy rumble coming from Pasqal's vox causes the Lexmechanic to lower his head in fear and contrition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “Onları durduracak bir şey de yapmamışsın. 'Kendi iradenle bir nöbetçi ol.’ buyruğuna karşı geldiğine dair kayıt giriyorum. Mürit Zeta-86, erişimlerini an itibarıyla kaldırıyorum. Raporunu bildirebilirsin.” {n}Pasqal’ın voksundan gelen soğuk gürültü, Lexmekanik’in korku ve nedamet içinde başını eğmesine yol açıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
